subject: Re: [junit] yahoo versus gmail
msgSnippet: Yes, you can subscribe using another email account by sending an email to junit-subscribe@yahoogroups.com. I hope this helps. Corey On Mar 23, 2013, at 7:31,
messageBody:
Yes, you can subscribe using another email account by sending an email to
junit-subscribe@yahoogroups.com.

I hope this helps.

Corey

On Mar 23, 2013, at 7:31, mentat_thufir <mentat_thufir@...> wrote:



I don't normally use yahoo, but seem to be using a yahoo account to send
this message. Is it possible to use my gmail address instead?

thanks,

Thufir
hawat.thufir@...
